1.text: And these were sons of David, who were born to him in Hebron: the first-born Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess;

2.text: the third Absalom, son of Maachah daughter of Talmai king of Geshur; the fourth Adonijah, son of Haggith;

3.text: the fifth Shephatiah, of Abital; the sixth Ithream, of Eglah his wife.

4.text: Six have been borne to him in Hebron, and he reigneth there seven years and six months, and thirty and three years he hath reigned in Jerusalem.

5.text: And these were born to him in Jerusalem: Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomonâ€”four, of Bath-Sheba daughter of Ammiel:

6.text: also Ibhar, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,

7.text: and Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

8.text: and Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.

9.text: All are sons of David, apart from sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.

10.text: And the son of Solomon is Rehoboam, Abijah his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,

11.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

12.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

13.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

14.text: Amon his son, Josiah his son.

15.text: And sons of Josiah: the first-born Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.

16.text: And sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.

17.text: And sons of Jeconiah: Assir; Salathiel his son;

18.text: also Malchiram and Pedaiah, and Shenazzar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

19.text: And sons of Pedaiah: Zerubbabel, and Shimei. And sons of Zerubbabel: Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister,

20.text: and Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushab-Hesed, five.

21.text: And sons of Hananiah: Pelatiah, and Jesaiah, sons of Rephaiah, sons of Arnan, sons of Obadiah, sons of Shechaniah.

22.text: And sons of Shechaniah: Shemaiah; and sons of Shemaiah: Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.

23.text: And sons of Neariah: Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.

24.text: And sons of Elioenai: Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Delaiah, and Anani, seven.
